.front {
  margin: 0 auto;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: subpixel-antialiased; }
  .front p {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0; }

.dre-item a {
  text-decoration: none; }

.dre-item__image {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 100%;
  display: block; }

.dre-item__title {
  display: block; }

.dre-item__title,
.dre-item__title:hover {
  color: inherit; }

a.dre-item__summary,
a.dre-item__summary:hover {
  display: block;
  color: inherit; }

.dre-item {
  position: relative; }
  @media (min-width: 1010px) {
    .dre-item {
      --dre-row-gap: 16px;
      --dre-min-breakpoint: 1010px;
      --dre-layout-mode: adaptive; } }
  @media (min-width: 960px) and (max-width: 1009px) {
    .dre-item {
      --dre-row-gap: 1.58416vw;
      --dre-min-breakpoint: 960px;
      --dre-max-breakpoint: 1009px;
      --dre-layout-mode: responsive; } }
  @media (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 959px) {
    .dre-item {
      --dre-row-gap: 2.08333vw;

      --dre-max-breakpoint: 959px;
      --dre-layout-mode: responsive; } }
  @media (max-width: 767px) {
    .dre-item {
      --dre-row-gap: 8px;
      --dre-max-breakpoint: 767px;
      --dre-layout-mode: responsive; } }

[data-text-fit="max-all"] p {
  white-space: nowrap; }

  display: block; }

    clear: both; }

      margin-bottom: 8px; } }

  display: none; }

        margin-right: 0; }

    margin-bottom: 2.08333vw; }
  .dre-group--main-others .dre-item:last-child {
    margin-bottom: 0; }
  .dre-group--main-others .dre-item:nth-child(3) {
    margin-top: 0;
    margin-bottom: 2.08333vw; }
  .dre-group--main-others.dre-group--flipped .dre-item:first-child {
    order: 1; }
  .dre-group--main-others.dre-group--flipped .dre-item:nth-child(1n + 4) {
    order: 2; }
  .dre-group--main-others.dre-group--3-items {
    margin-bottom: 0; }
  .dre-group.dre-group--half-half .dre-group__content &gt; .dre-item:first-child {
    margin-right: 2.08333vw; }
  .dre-group.dre-group--half-half .dre-group__content &gt; .dre-item:nth-child(3) {
    margin-top: 8px;
    margin-bottom: 8px; }
  .dre-group.dre-group--quarter .dre-group__content &gt; .dre-item:nth-child(1),
  .dre-group.dre-group--quarter .dre-group__content &gt; .dre-item:nth-child(2) {
    margin-bottom: 2.08333vw; }
  .dre-group--md-all-full-width,
  .dre-group--md-all-full-width.dre-group--2-items {
    margin-bottom: 0; }
    .dre-group--md-all-full-width .dre-group__content,
    .dre-group--md-all-full-width.dre-group--2-items .dre-group__content {
      display: block; }
      .dre-group--md-all-full-width .dre-group__content &gt; div,
      .dre-group--md-all-full-width .dre-group__content &gt; .dre-item:nth-child(1n),
      .dre-group--md-all-full-width.dre-group--2-items .dre-group__content &gt; div,
      .dre-group--md-all-full-width.dre-group--2-items .dre-group__content &gt; .dre-item:nth-child(1n) {
        float: none;
        margin: 0 auto 2.08333vw; } }

@media (max-width: 767px) {
  .dre-group {
    margin-bottom: 8px; }
  .dre-group--sm-empty {
    display: none; }
  .dre-group--continuation {
    padding-bottom: 8px; }
  .dre-item__alt-title--sm {
    display: block; }
  .dre-item__alt-title--lg,
  .dre-item__alt-title--md {
    display: none; }
  .dre-group--main-others {
    margin-bottom: 0; }
  .dre-group--half .dre-group__content {
    display: flex;
    flex-flow: row wrap; }
  .dre-group--third {
    margin-bottom: 0; }
    .dre-group--third .dre-item {
      margin-bottom: 8px; }
  .dre-group--quarter {
    margin-bottom: 0; }
    .dre-group--quarter .dre-group__content {
      display: flex;
      flex-flow: row wrap;
      justify-content: space-between; }
      .dre-group--quarter .dre-group__content &gt; .dre-item {
        margin-bottom: 8px; }
  .dre-group.dre-group--half-half .dre-group__content &gt; .dre-item {
    margin-right: 0; }
    .dre-group.dre-group--half-half .dre-group__content &gt; .dre-item:first-child {
      margin-right: 16px; }
    .dre-group.dre-group--half-half .dre-group__content &gt; .dre-item:nth-child(3) {
      margin-top: 8px;
      margin-bottom: 8px; }
    .dre-group.dre-group--half-half .dre-group__content &gt; .dre-item:nth-child(1n + 4) {
      margin-bottom: 8px; }
    .dre-group.dre-group--half-half .dre-group__content &gt; .dre-item:last-child {
      margin-bottom: 0; }
  .dre-group.dre-group--half-half.dre-group--sm-all-full-width .dre-group__content &gt; .dre-item:nth-child(3) {
    margin-top: 0; }
  .dre-group--flipped .dre-item:first-child {
    order: 1; }
  .dre-group--flipped .dre-item:nth-child(1n + 4) {
    order: 2; }
  .dre-group--sm-all-full-width,
  .dre-group--sm-all-full-width.dre-group--2-items {
    margin-bottom: 0; }
    .dre-group--sm-all-full-width .dre-group__content,
    .dre-group--sm-all-full-width.dre-group--2-items .dre-group__content {
      display: block !important; }
      .dre-group--sm-all-full-width .dre-group__content &gt; div,
      .dre-group--sm-all-full-width .dre-group__content &gt; .dre-item:nth-child(1n),
      .dre-group--sm-all-full-width.dre-group--2-items .dre-group__content &gt; div,
      .dre-group--sm-all-full-width.dre-group--2-items .dre-group__content &gt; .dre-item:nth-child(1n) {
        float: none !important;
        margin: 0 auto;
        margin-bottom: 8px !important; } }

  font-size: calc(18em/16); }

  font-size: calc(24em/16); }

  font-size: calc(18em/16); }

  font-size: calc(14em/16); }

  font-size: calc(18em/16); }

  margin-bottom: 20px; }

  white-space: normal; }

  position: relative;
  text-align: center;
  height: 0;
  padding-bottom: 66.666667%;

    max-width: 100%; }

  position: relative;
  display: block; }

    overflow: hidden; }

    position: absolute;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background: #fff;
    background-image: var(--bg-image);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    pointer-events: none; }

      .dre-item__asset .dre-item__video {
        background-image: var(--bg-image-md); } }

      .dre-item__asset .dre-item__video {
        background-image: var(--bg-image-sm); } }

      pointer-events: all; }
    .dre-item__asset .dre-item__video[data-fit="crop"] {
      object-fit: cover; }
    .dre-item__asset .dre-item__video[data-fit="letterbox"] {
      object-fit: contain; }
  .dre-item__asset .dre-item__gif {
    position: absolute;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background: #fff;
    text-align: center; }
    .dre-item__asset .dre-item__gif img {
      object-fit: contain;
      object-position: center;
      max-width: 100%;
      max-height: 100%; }

    flex: 0 0 482px;
    width: 482px; }

    max-width: 316px; }
  .dre-item--size-quarter {
    flex: 0 0 233px;
    width: 233px; } }

@media (min-width: 960px) and (max-width: 1009px) {
  .dre-item--size-full-image-left,
  .dre-item--size-full {
    flex: 0 0 97.0297vw;
    width: 97.0297vw; }
  .dre-item--size-two-thirds-image-left,
  .dre-item--size-two-thirds {
    flex: 0 0 64.15842vw;
    width: 64.15842vw;
    max-width: 64.15842vw; }
  .dre-item--size-full-image-left .dre-item__header,
  .dre-item--size-full-image-left .dre-item__chasers,
  .dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-left .dre-item__header,
  .dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-left .dre-item__chasers,
  .dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-right .dre-item__header,
  .dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-right .dre-item__chasers {
    flex-basis: 100%; }
  .dre-item--size-full-image-left .dre-item__asset,
  .dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-left .dre-item__asset,
  .dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-right .dre-item__asset {
    flex: 0 0 31.28713vw; }
  .dre-item--size-full-image-left .dre-item__text,
  .dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-left .dre-item__text,
  .dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-right .dre-item__text {
    flex: 0 0 64.15842vw; }
  .dre-item--size-two-thirds-image-left .dre-item__header,
  .dre-item--size-two-thirds-image-left .dre-item__chasers {
    flex-basis: 64.15842vw; }
  .dre-item--size-two-thirds-image-left .dre-item__asset {
    flex: 0 0 23.06931vw; }
  .dre-item--size-two-thirds-image-left .dre-item__text {
    flex: 0 0 39.50495vw;
    max-width: 39.50495vw;
    box-sizing: border-box; }
  .dre-item--size-half {
    flex: 0 0 47.72277vw;
    width: 47.72277vw; }
  .dre-item--size-third {
    flex: 0 0 31.28713vw;
    width: 31.28713vw;
    max-width: 31.28713vw; }

    flex: 0 0 23.06931vw;

  from {
    opacity: 0.2; }
  to {
    opacity: 0.8; } }

  background: #f0f0f0; }

    margin-top: 15px;
    box-sizing: content-box; }

      .dre-preview .front {
        padding: 0 15px; } }

        padding: 0 0; } }

    margin-left: 0; } }

  background: #f0f0f0;
  color: #2f2f2f;
  margin-top: 15px; }
  @media (min-width: 1010px) {
    .theme-dn-est {
      width: 980px;
      max-width: 980px; } }

    .theme-dn-est {

      max-width: 97.0297vw; } }
  @media (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 959px) {
    .theme-dn-est {

      width: 95.83333vw;
      max-width: 95.83333vw; } }

    .theme-dn-est {
      width: 100vw; } }

    font-family: 'Guardian Sans', sans-serif;
    font-weight: 900; }

    font-weight: 400; }

    font-weight: 600; }

    font-weight: 400; }

    background: #fff;
    position: relative;
    padding-bottom: 32px;
    z-index: 1; }
    .theme-dn-est .dre-group--skin-topic .dre-group__header-content {
      border-top: 8px solid #004f84;
      text-decoration: none; }
    @media (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 959px) {
      .theme-dn-est .dre-group--skin-topic {
        padding-bottom: 4.16667vw; } }
    @media (max-width: 767px) {
      .theme-dn-est .dre-group--skin-topic {
        padding-bottom: 8px;
        margin-bottom: 8px;
        border-bottom: 8px solid #e7e7e7; } }
    .theme-dn-est .dre-group--skin-topic::before {
      content: '';
      z-index: -1;
      display: block;
      position: absolute;
      border-top: 8px solid #e7e7e7;
      border-bottom: 8px solid #e7e7e7;
      background: #fff;
      top: 0;
      bottom: 0; }

          right: -2.08333vw;
          width: 100vw; } }

    background: #effaff; }

      color: #008bd0;
      font-size: calc(18em / 16);
      font-weight: normal;
      margin-bottom: calc(5em / 18); }

      font-family: 'Guardian Text Egyptian Web', serif;
      font-weight: normal; }

      white-space: normal !important; }

    .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live .dre-item__pretitle,
    .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-breaking .dre-item__pretitle {
      font-size: calc(14em / 16); }
      @media (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 959px) {
        .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live .dre-item__pretitle,
        .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-breaking .dre-item__pretitle {
          font-size: calc(14vw / 7.68); } }
    @media (min-width: 960px) {
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live.dre-item--no-image .dre-item__text::before, .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live.dre-item--size-full-image-left .dre-item__text::before, .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live.dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-left .dre-item__text::before, .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live.dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-right .dre-item__text::before,
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-breaking.dre-item--no-image .dre-item__text::before,
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-breaking.dre-item--size-full-image-left .dre-item__text::before,
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-breaking.dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-left .dre-item__text::before,
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-breaking.dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-right .dre-item__text::before {
        content: 'Siste';
        display: flex;
        align-self: flex-start;
        align-items: center;
        height: calc(30em / 16);
        text-transform: uppercase;
        font-family: 'Guardian Sans', sans-serif;
        border: 1px solid #fff;
        font-weight: normal;
        letter-spacing: 0.57px;
        background: #ff6027;
        color: #fff;

        line-height: 1;

        box-sizing: border-box;

      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live.dre-item--no-image .dre-item__text::after, .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live.dre-item--size-full-image-left .dre-item__text::after, .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live.dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-left .dre-item__text::after, .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live.dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-right .dre-item__text::after,

      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-breaking.dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-right.dre-item--feature-live .dre-item__asset::after {
        content: initial; }
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live.dre-item--size-two-thirds-image-left.dre-item--feature-live .dre-item__text::before, .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live.dre-item--size-two-thirds.dre-item--image-left.dre-item--feature-live .dre-item__text::before, .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live.dre-item--size-two-thirds.dre-item--image-right.dre-item--feature-live .dre-item__text::before, .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live.dre-item--size-two-thirds-image-left.dre-item--feature-live .dre-item__text::before, .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live.dre-item--size-full-image-left.dre-item--feature-live .dre-item__text::before, .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live.dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-left.dre-item--feature-live .dre-item__text::before, .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live.dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-right.dre-item--feature-live .dre-item__text::before,

      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-breaking.dre-item--sm-full.dre-item--feature-live .dre-item__asset::before,
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-breaking.dre-item--sm-half.dre-item--feature-live .dre-item__asset::before {
        content: 'Direkte'; } }
    @media (min-width: 960px) {
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live.dre-item--size-full-image-left .dre-item__text::after, .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live.dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-left .dre-item__text::after,
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-breaking.dre-item--size-full-image-left .dre-item__text::after,
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-breaking.dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-left .dre-item__text::after {
        left: calc(9em / 16); } }
    @media (min-width: 960px) {
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live.dre-item--size-full-image-left.dre-item--image-right .dre-item__text::after, .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-live.dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-right .dre-item__text::after,
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--feature-breaking.dre-item--size-full-image-left.dre-item--image-right .dre-item__text::after,

        left: calc(19em / 16); } }

    .theme-dn-est .dre-item--skin-brief .dre-item__chaser--badge-magasinetplus .dre-item__chaser-footer::before {
      display: inline-block;
      background-image: url("https://smooth-storage.aptoma.no/users/drf-dn/files/logos/bvb4-yveal-Magasinet+.svg?accessToken=3a19ecdab758ed3609d9884623c7ddecf67d49e91fb5ade4a5a191e09f4c9ab5");
      width: calc(38em / 14); }
    .theme-dn-est .dre-item--skin-brief .dre-item__chaser--badge-smak .dre-item__chaser-footer::before {

      width: calc(56em / 14); }
    .theme-dn-est .dre-item--skin-brief .dre-item__chaser--badge-smakplus .dre-item__chaser-footer::before {

      .theme-dn-est .dre-item[data-priority='A'].dre-item--sm-full-image-right .dre-item__alt-title--sm {
        font-size: 26px; }
    .theme-dn-est .dre-item--sm-full-image-left,
    .theme-dn-est .dre-item--sm-full-image-right,
    .theme-dn-est .dre-item--no-image,
    .theme-dn-est .dre-item--skin-advertorial,
    .theme-dn-est .dre-item--sm-full-image-left,
    .theme-dn-est .dre-item--skin-brief {
      width: calc(100vw - 12px); }
    .theme-dn-est .dre-item--sm-full-image-left,
    .theme-dn-est .dre-item--sm-full-image-right {
      display: flex;
      align-items: flex-start;
      flex-direction: row;
      flex-wrap: wrap; }
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--sm-full-image-left .dre-item__asset,
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--sm-full-image-right .dre-item__asset {
        margin-right: 0;
        min-height: 32.27723vw;
        align-self: stretch;
        width: 30.48889vw;
        flex: 0 0 30.48889vw; }
        .theme-dn-est .dre-item--sm-full-image-left .dre-item__asset img,
        .theme-dn-est .dre-item--sm-full-image-right .dre-item__asset img {
          position: absolute;
          height: 100%;
          object-fit: cover; }
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--sm-full-image-left .dre-item__text,
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--sm-full-image-right .dre-item__text {
        flex: 1 1 1vw;
        min-height: 32.27723vw; }
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--sm-full-image-left .dre-item__title,
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--sm-full-image-left .dre-item__alt-title--sm,

      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--sm-full-image-right .dre-item__alt-title--sm {
        font-size: 18px; }

      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--sm-full-image-right .dre-item__pretitle {
        font-size: 14px; }

      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--sm-full-image-right .dre-item__chasers {
        flex: 1 1 100%; }

      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--sm-full-image-right .dre-item__asset::before {
        display: none; }

      content: 'Direkte'; }

      font-size: 12px; }

      font-size: 14px; }
    .theme-dn-est .dre-item--skin-brief .dre-item__chasers {
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: row;
      overflow-x: scroll;
      white-space: nowrap; }
    .theme-dn-est .dre-item--skin-brief .dre-item__chaser {
      font-size: 16px;
      display: inline-flex;
      flex-wrap: nowrap;
      white-space: normal;
      flex: 0 0 300px;
      min-height: 100px;
      margin-right: 16px;
      margin-bottom: 8px; }
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--skin-brief .dre-item__chaser:last-child {
        margin-right: 0;
        margin-bottom: 4px; }
    .theme-dn-est .dre-item--skin-brief .dre-item__chaser-footer {
      height: 21px;
      font-size: 14px; }
      .theme-dn-est .dre-item--skin-brief .dre-item__chaser-footer a {
        padding-top: 1px;
        padding-bottom: 1px;
        top: 0; } }

.measure .dre-item--no-image {
  display: block; }

.measure .dre-item__title {
  max-width: 100%;
  box-sizing: border-box; }

.measure .dre-item--skin-magasinet .dre-item__text {
  align-items: initial; }

.measure .wrapper--size-full-image-left .dre-item__text {
  align-items: initial !important;
  padding-top: 10px !important; }

.measure .wrapper--size-full-image-left .dre-item__title {
  text-align: left !important;
  padding: 0 !important; }

@media (min-width: 960px) {
  .measure .dre-item__text-background-image {
    margin-left: calc(20em / 16); }
  .measure .dre-item--feature-opinion .dre-item__text-background-image ~ .dre-item__title {
    margin-right: calc(2em / 16); } }

@media (max-width: 767px) {
  .measure .dre-item {
    --dre-text-fit: none;
    --dre-font-size-unit: vw; }
  .measure .wrapper--size-full-image-left,
  .measure .wrapper--size-full {
    width: 100vw; } }

/*# sourceMappingURL=dn-est.css.map */
